extension.description: Groups your news by sections or by categories

field.name: layout
field.label: Article List Layout
field.description: Choose an Article List Layout

field.name: cols
field.label: Columns
field.description: Number of columns

field.name: margin
field.label: Margin
field.description: Margin between Groups

field.name: catid
field.label: Categories
field.description: Please select one or more categories

field.name: show_child_category_articles
field.label: Child Category Articles
field.description: Include or Exclude Articles from Child Categories

field.name: levels
field.label: Category Depth
field.description: The number of child category levels to return

field.name: cat_order
field.label: Category Order
field.description: Categories/Sections ordering options

field.name: empty
field.label: Empty Category
field.description: Hide/Show empty Category/Section

field.name: curcat
field.label: Current Category
field.description: If you are viewing a particular Category/Section

field.name: show_cat
field.label: Category Header
field.description: Show/Hide Category/Section name

field.name: cat_title
field.label: Category Title
field.description: Category/Section Title

field.name: cat_img_align
field.label: Category Image
field.description: Categories/Sections Images

field.name: cat_img_width
field.label: Category Image Width
field.description: Category Image Width (px), or leave blank for a proportional width

field.name: cat_img_height
field.label: Category Image Height
field.description: Category Image Height (px), or leave blank for a proportional height

field.name: cat_img_margin
field.label: Category Image Margin
field.description: Category Image Margin

field.name: cat_img_border
field.label: Category Image Border
field.description: Category Image Border

field.name: count
field.label: Count Articles
field.description: The number of items to display for each Section/Category (default 5)

field.name: article_ordering
field.label: Article Field to Order By
field.description: Select which field you would like Articles to be ordered by. Featured Ordering should only be used when Ordering Option for Featured Articles is set to 'Only'

field.name: article_ordering_direction
field.label: Ordering Direction
field.description: Select the direction you would like Articles to be ordered by

field.name: limittitle
field.label: Title Chars Limit
field.description: Article's Title Characters Limit

field.name: show_front
field.label: Featuread Items
field.description: Show/Hide Featured Articles

field.name: created_by
field.label: Authors
field.description: Select one or more authors from the list below
field.query: select id, name, username from #__users where id IN (select distinct(created_by) from #__content) order by name ASC

field.name: current
field.label: Current Article in List
field.description: If you are looking at an article that happens to be on the list

field.name: more
field.label: MORE ARTICLES link
field.description: Show/Hide MORE ARTICLES link

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: If not auto, specify px, em or %

field.name: border
field.label: Border
field.description: Border (1px solid #EFEFEF)

field.name: header_color
field.label: Header Bgcolor
field.description: Header Background Color

field.name: header_padding
field.label: Header Padding
field.description: Category Header Padding

field.name: height
field.label: Content Area Height
field.description: Specify px, em or %

field.name: color
field.label: Content Area Bgcolor
field.description: Content Area Background Color

field.name: delay
field.label: Scroller/Slider Delay
field.description: Scroller/Slide Delay (ms)

field.name: next
field.label: Slider NEXT link
field.description: Show/Hide NEXT link in slider pagination

field.name: html
field.default: GN_image GN_title GN_break GN_date GN_break GN_text GN_readmore
field.label: HTML Supported Code for Content Layouts. FEATURED ELEMENTS: GN_image, GN_title, GN_text, GN_author, GN_date, GN_readmore, GN_hits_label, GN_hits_value, GN_break, GN_space
field.description: Insert any HTML code between the default elements

field.name: limittext
field.label: Text Chars Limit
field.description: Article's Text Characters Limit (0 means no limit)

field.name: striptext
field.label: Strip Tags?
field.description: Strip HTML tags from your Articles intro (full) text (Selecting No could cause an HTML mess-up)

field.name: allowedtags
field.label: Allowed Tags
field.description: If you choose to Strip Tags, you can write here down those tags you would like to keep

field.name: date_format
field.label: Date Format
field.description: Optional format for strftime, or leave blank for a formated date according to current local

field.name: date
field.label: Selected Date
field.description: Selected Date

field.description: Article Image Height (px), or leave blank for a proportional height

field.label: Article Image Margin
field.description: Article Image Margin

field.name: item_img_border
field.label: Article Image Border
field.description: Article Image Border

field.name: thumb_image
field.label: Create Thumbs
field.description: Auto create and display thumbs from the article images

field.name: thumb_bg
field.label: Background
field.description: Background color to fill out the thumb Applies only if 'Fill out with background/transparent color' is selected above

field.name: thumb_type
field.label: Image type
field.description: Image type of generated images

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
